summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 MIDWEST AUTOMOTIVE DESIGN WEEKENDER. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING 30 MPH, THE SUN SHADE AUTOMATIC AWNING DEPLOYED INDEPENDENTLY. THE CONTACT PULLED OVER ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND INSERTED THE SUN SHADE AUTOMATIC AWNING PROPERLY. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VIN WAS ASSOCIATED TO THE MANUFACTURER COMMUNICATIONS TSB NUMBER: 22019-07-02. THE RV WAS TAKEN TO LOCAL DEALER BOE MARINE LOCATED AT 325 CLEAT ST, STEVENSVILLE, MD 21666, (866) 735-5926 AND THE TSB WAS COMPLETED. THE RV WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER HAD BEEN INFORMED OF FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 15,000.
